title: Crypto Miner TeraWulf to Raise $3B in Google-Backed Debt Deal to Expand Data Centers
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: Google already owns 14% of TeraWulf and is supporting other crypto firms like Cipher Mining in their AI expansions.
